summary: Implemented the requested UI polish items: updated the Home hero to a darker cinematic image with a black gradient overlay, refined sticky navbar spacing/padding with a subtle shadow, enhanced StoryCard and LuxuryFeaturedStoryCard shadows + hover lift, added global 0.3s transitions for interactive elements, and introduced a serif/sans premium font pairing loaded via Google Fonts. However, the diff also changes global theme color tokens (e.g., setting a “Royal Blue accent” primary and adding gold/chart tokens), which was not explicitly requested and may exceed the scope of hero/navbar/cards/buttons/typography polish.

hallucinated_features.description: Global theme color/token redesign (e.g., switching primary to a “Royal Blue accent”, adding gold and chart palette tokens) beyond the requested hero/navbar/cards/buttons/typography polish.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest focuses on specific UI polish areas and does not request changing the site’s primary/accent color system or introducing new palette tokens like gold/charts.
